definition: to bemoan the state of the universe and pity the fate of mankind
to sympathize/to pity/to feel compassion for

sentences.english: Beth kept on, with only slight relapses into idleness or grieving.
sentences.chinese: 只有貝思堅持不懈，極少躲懶或悲天憫人。

sentences.english: Her spirit and compassion live on today.
sentences.chinese: 她的精神和悲天憫人至今仍留存於世。

sentences.english: Han Shan was a kind-hearted monk and also a poet.
sentences.chinese: 寒山是唐朝僧人，也是一個悲天憫人的詩人。

sentences.english: Now this sort of sentimentality always makes me furious.
sentences.chinese: 直到今天，這號悲天憫人地情調每每令我髮指。

sentences.english: The third chapter is about the women's compassion of"Mother Earth".
sentences.chinese: 第三章寫女性悲天憫人的“地母”情懷。
